issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
LLAP is able to deserialize and cache data from an input format (e.g. TextInputFormat) and will deliver that cached data to VectorMapOperator as VRBs.

Symptoms:

   BinaryComparable -> VectorizedRowBatch ClassCastException

   Text -> VectorizedRowBatch ClassCastException
fields.summary: Vectorization: Fix VectorMapOperator to accept VRBs and check vectorized flag correctly to support LLAP Caching

comments.body:
LGTM - +1

Left a comment on RB about adding a debug log for the row->vrb switch (for the eventual qtest based bug).
